news_header: Iran criticizes new US sanctions as illegal and unjustified.
news_text: Iran is condemning the new sanctions imposed by the United States, labeling them as illegal and unjustified. These economic sanctions, prepared by the White House, specifically target Iranian operators selling crude oil to China. Esmaeil Baqaei, spokesman for the Iranian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, stated that the US Administration's actions to hinder legitimate trade with other partners are offensive.
